hero.description: Dutanga serivisi nziza muri IT, gutanga ibiribwa, no kubaka.

service.title: Serivisi zacu
service.popupMessage: Kugira ngo wongere ku isoko, banza winjire cyangwa usinye

aboutus.title: Ibitwerekeyeho
aboutus.welcomeMessage: Murakaza neza muri Karkelly Company Ltd, Karkelly Company itanga ibikoresho byo mu biro byiza kandi bidasanzwe, bituma ugira ibitekerezo bishya no kunezerwa mu buzima bwawe bwa buri munsi
aboutus.modalDescription: Intego yacu ni uguteza imbere ibitekerezo no kuzana ibyishimo mu buzima bwa buri munsi binyuze mu bikoresho byo mu biro byiza kandi bidasanzwe. Intego yacu ni ugutanga ibicuruzwa n'ibikorwa byiza bihura n'ibyo abakiriya bacu bakeneye kandi bibahe ibyo bashaka.

infopage.title: Ikoranabuhanga
infopage.teachingComputerServiceContent: Dore amakuru arambuye ku bijyanye na Serivisi yo kwigisha mudasobwa. Harimo amasomo arambuye mu Ijambo, Excel, PowerPoint, Photoshop, n'ibindi. Uzagira uburambe bwimbitse bwa mudasobwa no kwandika binyuze mu nteguro yacu yuzuye.
infopage.printingServiceContent: Dore amakuru arambuye ku bijyanye na Serivisi yo gucapa. Dutanga fotokopi, gucapa amafoto, gucapa amakarita y'ubucuruzi, gucapa ibyandiko binini, gukora ibirango, no gucapa amakarita y'ubutumire.
infopage.onlineServiceContent: Dore amakuru arambuye ku bijyanye na Serivisi yo kuri interineti. Dutanga Irembo, Kwiyandikisha ku butaka, Gusora mu Kigo cy'Igihugu cy'Imisoro n'Amahoro, n'izindi serivisi zo kuri interineti kugirango dukemure ibyo ukeneye.

createAccount.title: Fungura Konti
createAccount.agreeToTermsAlert: Ugomba kwemera Amasezerano y'Imikoreshereze kugirango wiyandikishe.

terms.title: Amasezerano y'Imikoreshereze
terms.introduction: Aya masezerano ni amasezerano hagati yawe na KARRY KELLY LTD platform, kandi afite ingaruka zemewe n'amategeko ku mpande zombi. Murakoze gukoresha KARRY KELLY LTD. Turashaka kuguha uburambe bwiza kuri platform yacu. Twashyizeho uburyo bwo kugarura no kwishyura hakoreshejwe interineti kugira ngo uhore unyuzwe. Niba igihe icyo ari cyo cyose utanyuzwe n'igicuruzwa cyawe, urashobora kugarura igicuruzwa cyangwa igice cyacyo kugirango usubizwe amafaranga, kandi igicuruzwa kigaruwe kiri mu mwimerere wacyo (harimo gupakira k'umwimerere, ibirango, impano, inyemezabuguzi z'igurishwa, nibindi).
terms.hassleFreeReturnDescription: Niba igicuruzwa ushaka kugarura gifite 'Iminsi 7 Yagarura Bidashoboka,' urashobora guhitamo 'Iminsi 7 Yagarura Bidashoboka' muri KARRY KELLY LTD app mu minsi 7 nyuma yo kwakira kugirango usabe kugarura no gusubizwa amafaranga. Uzabona amafaranga yose y'igicuruzwa nyuma y'uko ubusabe bwawe bwemejwe. Nyamuneka wibuke ko uzishyura amafaranga yo kohereza mu gihugu ndetse n'amafaranga yo kohereza mpuzamahanga. Nta kugarura bishobora gukorwa niba byarenze iminsi 7.
terms.returnForProblemsDescription: Niba igicuruzwa wakiriye gifite ibibazo (nko kugabanuka k'umubare, igicuruzwa kibi, kwangirika k'igicuruzwa, cyangwa ibibazo by'ubuziranenge), nyamuneka usabe kugarura no gusubizwa amafaranga mu minsi 15 nyuma yo kwakira. Tanga ibisobanuro birambuye by'ikibazo, uhitemo impamvu nyayo yo kugarura, kandi upakishe amafoto y'igicuruzwa gifite ikibazo n'amakuru yo gukurikirana. Uzabona amafaranga yose y'igicuruzwa nyuma y'uko ubusabe bwawe bwemejwe. Ikoreshwa rya mpuzamahanga rizatangwa, ariko amafaranga yo kohereza mu gihugu (niba ariho) azaba inshingano zawe.
terms.orderNotReceivedDescription: Ku mabaruwa yemejwe ko arangiye ariko utarayakiriye, ushobora gusaba gusubizwa amafaranga gusa mu minsi 15 nyuma y'uko imiterere y'amabwiriza ihinduka kuba arangiye. Uzabona itangazo rivuga 'Ushobora gusaba gusubizwa amafaranga ako kanya ku ipaji y'itegeko ryawe niba utabonye ibicuruzwa byawe' hakoreshejwe ubutumwa bwo gushyira muri app.
terms.returnProcessDescription: Kuburambyo bwose bwemejwe bwo kugarura (n'impamvu iyo ari yo yose), abakiriya bagomba kugarura ibicuruzwa mu biro mu minsi 7; naho ubundi, kugarura (gusubizwa amafaranga) ntibishobora gukorwa.
terms.nonReturnableProductsDescription: Ibicuruzwa bidafite serivisi ya 'Iminsi 7 Yagarura Bidashoboka' (nka imyenda y'imbere, ibirungo, inj wigisiga, ibicuruzwa by'umubiri, ibicuruzwa byahinduwe, nibindi) ntibishobora kugarurwa cyangwa gusubizwa amafaranga keretse haramutse hari ikibazo cy'ubuziranenge bw'igicuruzwa ubwacyo. Nyamuneka reba ibisobanuro by'igicuruzwa mbere yo kugura.
terms.couponRefundsDescription: Niba kuponi yakoreshejwe ku itegeko ryawe, agaciro ka kuponi ntigashobora gusubizwa.
terms.refundsDescription: Amafaranga yose azasubizwa ku murongo wawe wa K-pay mu buryo bwikora nyuma y'uko kugarura bikozwe neza. Hindura umwirondoro wawe wa K-pay kugira ngo amafaranga asubizwe.
terms.currentLimitationsDescription: Kugeza ubu, KARRY KELLY LTD ishyigikira gusa kugarura no gusubizwa amafaranga kandi ntiyatanga serivisi yo gusimbuza (uretse ku bicuruzwa by'umwihariko bishyigikira gusimbuza ku ipaji y'ibisobanuro byabyo).
terms.guidelines: Nyamuneka komeza izi ngingo kugirango kugarura bikorwe neza.
terms.thankYou: Murakoze gukoresha KARRY KELLY LTD. Niba ufite ibibazo by'inyongera, nyamuneka uganire n'ikigo cyacu cya serivisi y'abakiriya yo kuri interineti.

errors.network_error: Ikosa rya netiweki. Ongera ugerageze nyuma.
